users

Class ACEmployee

  • java.lang.Object
    • users.AbstractUser
      • users.ACEmployee
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<AbstractUser>

    public class ACEmployee
extends AbstractUser
    ACEmployee Class depicts a Auction Central Employee which can perform the following operation.
    • View Monthly Auction List with past and future Auctions.
    • Detials of a specific Auction.

    Each Auction Central Employee is identified by a unique Username and the User Type Constant is 1. It is inherited from the Abstract User Class.

    See Also:
    AbstractUser, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ACEmployee

        public ACEmployee(java.lang.String theUsername)
        The Constructor of ACEmployee Class.

        Calls the constructor of the base class Abstract User and initializes the username of the Auction Employee as well as the user type as 1.

        Parameters:
        theUsername - the unique username of the Auction Employee.

    • Method Detail

      • viewCalendar

        public void viewCalendar(model.AuctionCalendar theCalendar)
        Lists the month wise auctions in the auction calendar. Can be accessed only by an Auction Central Employee.

        Numerical value of the month is provided by the user which is validated for an Integer.Incorrect Month Numerical is also validated. Method exits on pressing -1 from the User via I/O Console.

        Parameters:
        theCalendar - it stores the auction list month wise along with the user list which has created the auction.
        See Also:
        AuctionCalendar

      • viewAuctionDetails

        public void viewAuctionDetails(model.AuctionCalendar theCalendar)
        Lists all the auctions in a specific month and selectively view a particular auction. Can be accessed only by an Auction Central Employee.

        Numerical value of the month is provided by the user which is validated for an Integer.Incorrect Month Numerical and invalid auction number in the auction list is also validated.

        Parameters:
        theCalendar - it stores the auction list month wise along with the user list which has created the auction.
        See Also:
        AuctionCalendar

        public int compareTo(AbstractUser otherUser)
